attributes.action: Tobacco and Alcohol products too list all the ingredients on the packaging.
attributes.additional_details:
Other products that we consume have to list the ingredients that make up that product. Tobacco and Alcohol products that are consumed do not. Consumers should be aware of all of the ingredients that make up products they consume.
Tobacco may not be eaten but it is consumed in that smoke is inhaled from the product when ignited. If the ingredients in the unlighted tobacco is not listed then the ingredients inhaled should be and in a format that is easily readable by eye.
This may require product packaging to be re-designed to clearly display to the consumer the consumed contents.
